data.title: Germany bids farewell to brave Turkish young woman - Thousands in Germany are saying “danke” to a Turkish young woman who was brutally attacked for trying to rescue two German women from being harassed, before her life support is turned off on her birthday.

U.K. police force accidentally admits it spied on journalists who had not committed any crimes, using anti-terror RIPA laws. Asks paper to delete article covering this once it realized what it had done. Newspaper refuses.

Pope Francis: We must condemn those who use religion to violate human rights; he condemned the “barbaric violence” committed by ISIS, against religious minorities in Syria, and said that military action against the group was justified
Facebook can gain direct access to your mobile and take pictures or make videos at any time, MPs warn - Telegraph
Tigers Are Dying in Record Numbers in India
New Snowden Documents reveal rather comprehensive tapping of Irish undersea cables by GCHQ
ISIS Is Now Launching Attacks From Inside Turkey
Russia Is Building A Network of Military Bases In The Arctic
Russia Plans Massive Productivity and Wage Hike for Space Industry Workforce
Indian man who allegedly killed 55 people fighting for ISIS quit to return home because ISIS didn't pay him
